message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"to introduce someone or something","sentence":"我来介绍他。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene showing a young person pointing to another person, as if introducing them to a group. The background is subdued and slightly eerie, with remnants of a modern city in gentle ruin, but the atmosphere is friendly. The two people are drawn simply, with clear facial expressions of welcoming and friendliness. There is a subtle glow around the people being introduced, emphasizing the act of introduction.","sentence_translation":"I will introduce him."}
